SEARCH
Package se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.impl

Class AbstractCMCCaApi

java.lang.Object
se.swedenconnect.ca.cmc.api.impl.AbstractCMCCaApi
All Implemented Interfaces:
CMCCaApi
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAdminCMCCaApi
public abstract class AbstractCMCCaApi extends Object implements CMCCaApi
Abstract CMC CA API implementation implementing the functions of a CA service serving requests for service received in the form of a CMC request.
Author:
Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

  • Method Details

    • processRequest

      public CMCResponse processRequest(byte[] cmcRequestBytes)
      Processes a CMC Request in the context of a CA service. This function shall never throw an exception caused by errors in the request. Any such error condition is captured in an error response with appropriate error code and a suitable error message.
      Specified by:
      processRequest in interface CMCCaApi
      Parameters:
      cmcRequestBytes - the CMC request providing a request for service
      Returns:
      a CMC response providing the status and result data as a result of the service request

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • processCustomRequest

      protected CMCResponse processCustomRequest(CMCRequest cmcRequest) throws CMCException
      Process a custom request that adds to the standard CMC API by passing request data in the CMC request info byte array.
      Parameters:
      cmcRequest - CMC request
      Returns:
      CMC response
      Throws:
      CMCException - error parsing this as a valid custom request
